nodes.text: Dogs, also known as hounds, were a classification of non-sentient, quadrupedal or sometimes hexapedal species in the galaxy. One type was the akk dog, which was found on Anoat. The Begamore two-headed dog was found on the planet Begamore.

The term "dog" could also be used as a word for contempt. While C-3PO's head was temporarily attached to a B1-series battle droid's body during the First Battle of Geonosis, he was heard shouting, "Die, Jedi dogs!" Additionally, the phrase "wet dog" was used by Luke Skywalker to describe an odor he smelled while on Kupoh.
Dogs have been mentioned or referenced in several Legends sources, as well as the novelization of A New Hope, which reveals that Luke Skywalker owned a dog.
